tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
At Park Clinic, the dentist and staff  are passionate about what they are doing. They understand that and aim to provide the best dental care possible which starts with creating a warm, welcoming environment for the patients. The staff member strives to achieve this with a positive, upbeat attitude. The staff takes the extra time to thoroughly discuss your treatment options and answer any lingering questions you may have. At each step of the way, they work with you on your journey to improve your oral health.

I have experienced that they thrive to make the patient as comfortable as possible and make the most difficult treatment sound so easy. This is only because of the expertise which they have acquired with the professional acumen of Dr Neetu. 

One of the top reasons why I call them the provider of quality care is because Dr Neetu and her  team is able to make patients feel calm and comfortable. During discussions it appeared that their goal is to make even the most nervous of patients feel at ease during their appointments.

During each visit, they make a point to equip the patients with the knowledge and information they need to improve and maintain their oral health. Dr Neetu works closely with patients to provide customized treatment plans based on their individual needs. By carefully explaining the benefits of each option, she empowers the patients to make the best decisions for their oral health. In addition to providing quality dental services, she also provide tips on preventative practices that can help save you money in the future.
reply_text: Thanku so much for observing everything with eagles eye and appreciating it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had root canal 3 year back, all of sudden that tooth broke off.  I booked appointment with park dental clinic in such short notice doctor arranged everything,  explained so well. Dr.  Meeting extracted my tooth placed implant and it took only 1 hour time.  **** *** ** *** *********  ***** **** ** **** ***** *** ********* *** ***** Thank-you from heart.
reply_text: Thanku so much for your valuable feedback

review: Dr. Neetu Singh of Park Dental Clinic truly stands out in the world of dentistry. After several unsuccessful visits to different dentists, it was a relief to finally meet a prosthodontist who not only understood my concerns but also provided solutions that worked. Dr. Singh's expertise, combined with her compassionate approach, made my dental experience seamless and stress-free. I'm deeply appreciative of the exceptional care I received and would highly recommend her to anyone in search of top-notch dental care.

Coolest dentist ever 
Thankyou so much. I highly recommend Dr.Neetu
reply_text: Thanku so much for your valuable feedback

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Neetu has been like a God sent Tooth Fairy for me. 
Having the most horrible teeth and with a lot of problems, she was able to fix them with lot of patience and most importantly satisfactory results. Starting from a cavity to RCT to extraction and finally shaping of the teeth,all was done with a lot of passion for the work  and most of all the patience . 
My smile and my teeth look perfect to me after all the sittings I have had. 
Would strongly recommend the Dr for any teeth problem. And I am sure u would also walk out of the clinic with a smile on ur face. 
Thank you Dr. Neetu.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
On March 15th my broken tooth was swollen and i was feeling immense pain on my left jaw. It was way past 7pm and Mrs Neetu Singh had just left for the day and i had called Neetu and she was kind n gracious enough to come back after 7 and removed my tooth and prescribed me the medicine and it turned out the next day the swelling had gone. 

During my second visit to Park Dental i had gone for filling of tooth and i was impressed by her work and the filling of the tooth was to done from inside and she did it perfectly.

And recently on 12th June my third visit was for for fixing crown on my Upper Left tooth  since i had broken it while eating and again i opted for Park Dental, And got it fixed and my teeth aesthetic can't look any better and I was impressed by Neetu's work ethics she is very experienced, friendly She's quite gifted and i must say she is a walking encyclopedia of Dentistry. And i would definitely vouch for her pertaining to dental problems.

Thank You 

Soyuz
reply_text: Thanku so much for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Fillings,
review:
I visited Dr. Neetu for a capping issue last year. My earlier capping was not done properly by my previous dentist and it created further complications this time. Neetu Ma'am explained the situation pretty well and carried out the treatment incrementally addressing my each and every concerns (including answering emergency situations).

After my surgery I took my mother there  for capping and her experience was also seamless and extremely friendly. She is a adept, polite and  a highly professional individual and I recommended her for any Dental problems
reply_text: Thanku so much for your valuable feedback

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: ** ***** ***** ** ****** ******* *** very caring.She is very well experienced and explains the problem with complete clarity and eloquence.I had excruciating tooth ache like I took 10 pain killers in a single night.A previous dentist had suggested me dental implant but I was not satisfied with his explanation.Dr Neetu Singh with her dental experience saved my natural tooth by performing RCT.During the RCT,she found infection in adjacent tooth.So both my RCTs were performed with atmost perfection and care.After that seeing my tooth structure she suggested me zirconia crown for one tooth and E -Max crown for the other.Both the crowns suited me extremely well and I am completely satisfied.The kind of excruciating pain I had was unbearable but Dr Neetu Singh performed my RCT with extreme care and perfection.I will always go to her for my dental treatment and would recommend her to all.
reply_text: Thanku so much Parth for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Visited Dr Neetu for replacing my grandmother's old broken crown. The clinic is situated in a good, easily accessible area. Dr. Neetu explained the options available and the treatment procedure in depth and successfully relieved my grandmother's anxiety about getting treatment at an advanced age. The treatment was performed and completed successfully in minimal possible appointments. I will highly recommend Dr Neetu   for anyone looking for dental solutions specially in COVID times as the clinic is equipped with all the necessary equipments and protocols.

After visiting 3-4 dentists we met Dr Neetu Singh. Got the treatment which was not possible as told to us by other dentists. 
Quick diagnosis and treatment. 
Back to normal life. 
What normal life is can only be understood by those who has undergone the pain or their loved ones have suffered.
Thank you Dr Neetu Singh for your support.
Best Regards.
Agarwals
